page.title: 14CREST MOTEL
page.content: One of the chief amenities in the area and also one of the main employers is the Crest hotel which is situated just off the A.1. at South Mimms. It was once owned by Esso but is now a member of the Bass Charrington group of hotels. It is a 3 star A.A. & R.A.C. rated hotel and has over 200 beds and about a hundred staff to look after the guests. Most of the hotel's business is done between Monday & Thursday when 90% of the rooms are occupied.At the weekend only 45% of the rooms are full. Most of the hotel's clients are businessmen travelling to or from London. Some of the hotel's employees are local people but others have moved here and live in the hotel.
